com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue

Class StoreFeatures

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.StoreFeatures

  • public class StoreFeatures
extends Object
    Specifies the features that a given store supports

    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

      StoreFeatures clone()

      boolean hasLocalKeyPartition() 
      boolean isDistributed() 
      boolean isKeyOrdered() 
      boolean supportsBatchMutation()
      Whether this storage backend supports batch mutations via KeyColumnValueStoreManager.mutateMany(java.util.Map, StoreTransaction).
      boolean supportsConsistentKeyOperations()
      Whether this store supports consistent atomic operations on keys.
      boolean supportsLocking()
      Whether this store supports locking via KeyColumnValueStore.acquireLock(com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.StaticBuffer, com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.StaticBuffer, com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.StaticBuffer, StoreTransaction)
      boolean supportsMultiQuery()
      Whether this storage backend supports query operations on multiple keys, i.e KeyColumnValueStore.getSlice(java.util.List, SliceQuery, StoreTransaction)
      boolean supportsOrderedScan()
      Whether this storage backend supports global key scans via KeyColumnValueStore.getKeys(KeyRangeQuery, StoreTransaction)
      boolean supportsScan()
      Whether this storage backends supports scanning of any kind
      boolean supportsTransactions()
      Whether this storage backend is transactional.
      boolean supportsUnorderedScan()
      Whether this storage backend supports global key scans via KeyColumnValueStore.getKeys(SliceQuery, StoreTransaction)
